derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: partly from Dutch pink 'the little finger', reinforced by pink
late 19th cent.: from pink, of obscure origin

entry.def: Your pinkie is the smallest finger on your hand.

example.ex: He pushes his glasses up his nose with his pinkie.
example.tran: 他用小手指把眼镜向上推了推。

means.word_mean: 1. the finger farthest from the thumb
